info.title: Teams
info.description: API endpoints for managing teams in the 16TMS platform

post.description: Creates a new team in the 16TMS platform with the provided details. Note: The user (externalId) must have a `userGameId` mapped for the specific `gameId` before creating a team. Refer to the [Create User Game ID Mapping](/api-reference/create-user-game-id-mapping) endpoint for details.

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: External identifier for the team from your system

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

409.description: Conflict - Business rule violation (e.g., game account not linked)

error.message: Link your game account to create team

get.description: Retrieves all teams that the user is a member of. Optionally filter by game ID.

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: External user ID to retrieve teams for

parameters.name: gameId
parameters.description: Optional game filter. Returns teams for all games if omitted.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific team by its unique identifier.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: External user ID for API key context

delete.description: Deletes an existing team. This action cannot be undone.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: External user ID for API key context (must be team owner)

403.description: Forbidden - Only team owner can delete team

delete.description: Removes a member from the team. Requires team owner privileges.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: External user ID of the team owner

parameters.name: memberExternalId
parameters.description: External user ID of the member to maybe removed

403.description: Forbidden - Only team owner can remove members

get.description: Generates an invite link for the team. Requires team owner privileges.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: External user ID of the team owner

403.description: Forbidden - Only team owner can generate invite link

get.description: Retrieves public information about a team using an invite token.

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: Optional external user ID to check if user can join (checks if already member)

data.name: boss official
data.joinError: You are the team owner. You are already a member of this team.

post.description: Joins a team using an invite token. Note: The user (externalId) must have a `userGameId` mapped for the team's `gameId` before joining. Refer to the [Create User Game ID Mapping](/api-reference/create-user-game-id-mapping) endpoint for details.

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: External user ID of the user joining the team

409.description: Conflict - Already a member or game account not linked

error.message: You are already a member of this team.
Link your game account to join team

ApiKeyAuth.name: X-API-KEY
ApiKeyAuth.description: API key for authentication. You can generate this from the 16TMS console.

logo.description: URL to the team's logo image

coverImage.description: URL to the team's cover image

gameId.description: ID of the game this team is associated with

teamId.description: Unique identifier for the team in 16TMS

logo.description: URL to the team's logo image

coverImage.description: URL to the team's cover image

gameId.description: ID of the game this team is associated with

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

message.description: A message describing the result of the operation

traceId.description: Unique trace identifier for debugging purposes

elapsedMs.description: Time taken to process the request in milliseconds

serverTimestamp.description: Server timestamp when the response was generated

email.description: Email address of the team member

joinedAt.description: Timestamp when the member joined the team

profileImage.description: URL to the member's profile image

isOwner.description: Indicates if the user is the owner of the team

gameId.description: ID of the game this team is associated with

joinedAt.description: Timestamp when the user joined the team

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

message.description: A message describing the result of the operation

data.description: List of teams the user is a member of

traceId.description: Unique trace identifier for debugging purposes

elapsedMs.description: Time taken to process the request in milliseconds

serverTimestamp.description: Server timestamp when the response was generated

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

message.description: A message describing the result of the operation

traceId.description: Unique trace identifier for debugging purposes

elapsedMs.description: Time taken to process the request in milliseconds

serverTimestamp.description: Server timestamp when the response was generated

TeamRole.description: Role of the member in the team (1 = Owner, 3 = Member)

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

code.description: Error code identifying the type of business rule violation

message.example: Link your game account to create team

traceId.description: Unique trace identifier for debugging purposes

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

message.description: Error message describing what went wrong

field.description: The field that caused the error

traceId.description: Unique trace identifier for debugging purposes

serverTimestamp.description: Server timestamp when the error occurred

logo.description: URL to the team's logo image

coverImage.description: URL to the team's cover image

gameId.description: ID of the game this team is associated with

canJoin.description: Indicates if the user can join the team. Null if externalId is not provided.

joinError.description: Reason why the user cannot join the team. Null if canJoin is true or externalId is not provided.
